title: Connect to Secure Wi-Fi Network
description: A new staff member needs help connecting their laptop to the university's secure Wi-Fi network (e.g., Eduroam).

tasks.description: Explain the difference between the guest and secure Wi-Fi networks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clarifies why the secure network should be used.

tasks.description: Guide the user on how to select the secure network and enter their university credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides step-by-step instructions for the user's operating system.

tasks.description: If needed, guide the user to install a security certificate required for the network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the user download and trust the required certificate, leading to a successful connection.
